attributes.action: To make renting affordable for all.
attributes.additional_details: I want everyone to have a better chance at life.
attributes.background: I want landlords to decrease rent expectations from people, and for single parents, it’s too expensive and unaffordable especially when they have dependents who rely on them.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call for a specific action from the UK Government or Parliament. We understand you're concerned about the cost of renting, but we're not sure what specific action you'd like the Government or Parliament to take.

You may wish to sign the following petitions:

Impose caps on annual rent rises and additional taxes on vacant properties: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649788

Put a cap on profits made by private landlords: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/648065

Incentivise landlords not to sell properties & to charge affordable rents: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/652455
